ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... * Only charm the mob nodody is concentrating on? * Wait until yon monk is nearly dead before bringing relief his way?  Sometimes a near-death experience
ygData.messageBody:
--- Ioshua <Ioshua@...> wrote:

> On crowd control, how do you get a group to let you
> do it? Every time
> I try charm, mez or selective fear someone (often
> more than one) freaks
> out.

* Only charm the mob nodody is concentrating on?
* Wait until yon monk is nearly dead before bringing
relief his way? Sometimes a near-death experience
makes belivers out of people.
* Find a group of people who likes to play as a group
and welcomes effective innovation.

> And on Lament, using it at all. It worked nicely
> when I first got it
> and I loved it for a long time but haven't used it
> since the early
> twenties.

My experience has been opposite. I couln't use it for
squat at 8th lvl, but at 29, I pull with ease. I
haven't used it on more than 2 mobs at a time
successfully though...
